dublin_core.dcvalue: We assessed the association between formulary access via a handheld drug reference tool and utilization of generic Tier 1 and non generic non formulary Tier 3 medications In a retrospective before after study of physician prescribing behavior for patients in a large national health plan physicians with formulary access using Epocrates TM showed smaller 0 5 increases in Tier 3 prescribing over time compared to physicians without such access
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Formulary access using a PDA-based drug reference tool: does it affect prescribing behavior?
